answers.answer: Nothing, `max_tokens` does not impact the number of tokens in the prompt.
Python will truncate the prompt to the first 6 tokens.
Python will override `max_tokens` and set its value to 9.
You will see an error because the number of tokens in the prompt exceeds `max_tokens`.

source.guidance: Nothing happens. `max_tokens` does not affect the prompt tokens. `max_tokens` determines the length of the response.
source.instructions: **What happens if `max_tokens` is set to 6 while the number of tokens in the prompt is 9?**
source.name: Max_Tokens OpenAI
